snippet.title: A cute little island builder - Terraforma
snippet.description:
Today we are playing a cute little island builder indie game. There's quite a bit of waiting involved, but I guess it's called idle for a reason, eh?

This video was meant to go live at the end of the month, but my hard mode Endless Waves Survival run footage ended up not having any game audio, so I will have to re-record that. I noticed it last minute, so I had to edit and upload this one quickly instead. EWS continues next tuesday though as promised, so make sure you subscribe if you are interested in our hard mode run!

---

Terraforma is an idle game where you grow your land by placing blocks & buildings while carefully planning your placements. Make your own little world in this small idle game. Can't play a lot in a single sitting? No worries, your island generates a steady stream of income without any sort of micro-management.

You can play online or download it for FREE on itch.io!

https://benjatk.itch.io/terraforma
